tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visted doctor for my first pregnancy after 3 yrs of our marriage during April 2020 lockdown time. And we wished for a normal delivery. At the first time when saw doctor she gave me enough information abt the diet, pregnancy and for normal delivery and she was very friendly to me. On each visit she insisted abt the normal delivery tips. I used to have positive feel each time when I have a conversation with her. She completely remember my health history throughout my preganancy. As she assisted I had done all the exercises and the food control. My due date was Nov 24, 2020. I dilated to 3cm one week before my due date, but due to corona period we need to induce the pain by Nov 20 itself, as I didn't get any pain till that. doctor gave me two dosage of induction on the second dose I got the pain and contraction within 5 hrs I delivered a baby boy on Nov 21st 2020. As it was the lockdown time none of my parents or inlaws with me its only me and my husband and it was our first baby I got the complete support and energy from doctor's words only. Her positive words drove me throughout my pregnancy till my child birth. Whatever problem I report during the visit she gave me a positive word which gave me the strength to deliver the baby without any fear of first pregnancy. My and husband and I believed God has shown her to us while we searching for pregnancy consultation. We wanted to thank doctor for our lifetime. I hope everyone knows abt the importance of normal delivery for a women, I wished to have it but I never believed that I will do a normal delivery  till I meet the doctor because on the present times normal delivery was a bigger thing to be done. Only her encouraging words gave me a belief on myself that I also can make it possible. After delivery also doctor and the hospital gave a complete care to me and the baby. Doctor asked me to visit after 2 weeks of delivery to see the stitches. The stitches are also completely healed without any problem within a month. I am posting it little late my son is now 5 months, we both are doing good. Thank you doctor and God who showed us the doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia),
review:
Doctor Meghana is one of the most caring doctors we have had the pleasure of having. In the first visit itself me and my wife both felt we were in good place and after 2nd follow-up, we had realized ‚Äúnot only in good place, but also in safe hands‚Äù. Dr. Meghana listens to all problems, queries and concerns completely and then explains about the risks and non-risks followed by her remarkable treatment with a beautiful smile. 
In our case, in the initial months of pregnancy my wife struggled with sever cough. After consulting Dr. Meghana, we saw the results in the 2nd day itself and the medication was zero harm to our baby. Later in the end of 2nd trimester my wife BP was started fluctuating randomly in daily basis and had kept us in scary zone. Right treatment, timely follow-ups and remarkable support through Dr. Meghana‚Äôs personal channel made us to reach 38 week 3 days without any issue and we blessed with healthy baby boy.

We strongly recommend our beloved Dr. Meghana Reddy Jetty, *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** **** *** *** ** **** In one single sentence Dr. Meghana is ‚Äúone stop solution for pregnancy care‚Äù. 
Today me and my family were so much happy because of you. From our bottom of heart, Thank you so much Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** ***************


We have visited Dr Meghana for my first pregnancy.she gave us enough information about diet and other things in every visit.on each visit she insisted about normal delivery tips.entire my pregnancy i was  active & i did all house chores and office work  till the day before my delivery.I dilated to 3cm 10days before my due date
She told us may be after 3to 4 days labour pains will start & I was told to  check the baby movements carefully .exactly on 3rd day after visit , i was having minor pain in my stomach at midnight. immediately we have admitted & duty doctor told us i was in labour. After few pushes at some point I lost hope  that i will deliver  baby normal. Finally we did it  my little man came out on 2022 Jan 25th .yes it was normal delivery. Because of my doctor only this happen.she always encourages normal deliveries.

I will never forget her in my life as she has showed immanse support in my entire pregnancy and most importantly during labour.

Now our Son is 2.30 months old we both are  doing great

A Big Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è to Doctor Meghana

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ****** * **** **** *** *** ********** it was by god's grace I happened to consult Dr Meghana Reddy in my 6th month of pregnancy, due to doctor change. consulted her in Columbia and as well in her Healo' Nest clinic at gunjur. Her way of explaining and answering our queries is the best, she has always been there for me throughout this pregnancy and had informed earlier that it would be a normal delivery and yes I delivered my baby boy last week through normal delivery. *** ***** *** ** *** *********** *********** ****** ********** ** *********** ************* **** her tips and timely advices has helped me deliver my baby normally. she has been a constant support especially during my labour time. she provided her number in the 1st visit and was always available over msgs during any time of the day and night and has guided us through.Thank you so much doctor, our family is a fan of you and would highly recommend Dr Meghana Reddy for all. If you are consulting with her I am sure you are in safe hands.this is truly a genuine feedback and please consider.thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It all started with small diagnosis of cyst on ovary. First we went to gynaeconcologist referred by my physician when my ca 125(marker test or Anti gen test to find if cyst is benign or malignant) level was high and a cyst found near the ovary. Doctor had  recommended us to go for open surgery for the removal of cyst , ovaries and uterus to avoid the risk. Then on my  friend's recommendation, we went to Dr Meghana Reddy for the second opinion, she had a detailed look at the reports,  advised to take ca 125 one more time and ultra sound. With the new ca125 result (it came down) She explained us in detail and helped us to understand the diagnosis and go for Laproscopy. Her knowledge and confidence made our decision easy. She performed laparoscopic surgery and removed the cyst and it turned out as predicted to be benign. She took extremely good care from diagnosis to surgery and post surgery. Her empathy, sound knowledge, calm, composed and caring nature gives required comfort and confidence. I really appreciate Dr Meghana has taken care of the entire situation and the care she is taking after the surgery. Highly recommended for any Gyneac issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I loved the way  how doctor Meghana explained about my health and her friendliness with me. She is most important person whom I will never forget in my life as she supported me not only in my pregnancy time but also during labour, she helped me get through my labour pains and with the help of her guidelines given during my  check up I was delivered normally. She is very caring towards her patients , not only me the whole of my family liked her care towards me . She will respond to any of our queries without any hesitation, totally I'm very much Satisfied with her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr. Meghana and her team is wonderful. If it wasnt for them it would not have been easy for me to go through delivery.. I really appreciate and thank them for the support. Dr. Meghana is a strong woman and doctor apart from that she is also caring , nice , friendly and understands her patients.. would also like to call out Dr. Aruna for being so caring and calming me down and other doctors and staff who assisted in delivery. Gem of a team.... They won't let you give up and neither will they give up..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
#Gynaecology / #Pregnancy related matters STRONGLY RECOMMENDED  ‚ÄúDr. Meghana Reddy‚Äù

Sharing details ‚ÄúMother of Lovely Princess‚Äù:

I was in Europe for quite long time, My health was not supporting due to cold weather; getting doctors appointments was very difficult. Hence moved to India visited Few Corporate Hospital‚Äôs in Hyderabad; treatment were okay but no results. Intentionally Shifted to Bangalore, Thanks to friends Recommended few Hospitals in Whitefield, Bangalore and most preferred Columbia Asia. I have taken only 4 Appointments with very few follow-ups; we got the good news; I am really happy to find such a humble and nice Doctor; Never wanted to change Doctor cause I was very much confident, comfortable and friendly with doctor; On 31:05:2021 blessed with Baby girl Normal Labour - It‚Äôs very few Doctors recommend 1st priority for Normal labour.

I Consulted Dr. Meghna throughout my pregnancy. I met her on recommendation of one of my friends and I can't be thankful enough to my friend for recommending her to me.  She is the most genuine doctor I have ever come across and will only advice what is the best for you. She doesn't hurry up the appointments, but is very patient and gives you all the time to answer all your queries. She makes you feel very comfortable and made the full journey even more beautiful. My pregnancy wouldn't have been so smooth without her. Thank you again!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have delivered baby three weeks back. It was a normal delivery. I am very thankful to Dr. Meghana for her friendly approach. I felt like a family. I had started visiting her from the beginning of my pregnancy. She used to explain every step in detail and ensured it will be great journey together. During covid phase she was approachable on whatsApp. 
During course of delivery she encouraged me a lot bear the labor pain. Thankfully all went well due to her expertise and experience. She is very polite and soft spoken. 
I highly recommend Dr meghana and healonest for all gynaecological treatment. 
Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First time we had consulted with Dr Meghana Reddy when she was still working with Columbia Asia. we were really satisfied with her treatment and decided that we will visit her in future as well if needed to consult a gynae. Few months later when my wife concieved  we again visited Columbia Asia to consult with Dr Meghana Reddy however she wasn't working with hospital anymore so we tried to find her details over internet and were really glad to know that she has started a clinic nearby our home.  since then we have been consulting the doctor for my wife pregnancy. Dr has been really great. always available to answer patinet question. We welcome our child this March. The entire delivery process was done in the Rainbow hospital. This was managed really well and we are really happy with entire experience with rainbow hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We've started visiting Dr. Meghana from May 2020 ,since wife was struggling with her mensuration period delay due to underlying past history PCOS and Thyroid issue. Then onwards she has guided my wife like a sister and initially we were not ready to have a child due to the given situation of PCOS and Thyroid. However Dr. Meghana confirm there will not be any risk and Normal delivery can be done. She monitor her her health for nine months and whenever we have doubts she is ready to listen and easy to reach by whatsapp. We are extremely happy for support of Dr. Meghana and thank you so much for safely delivering our baby. üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Meghana has been great support for our baby‚Äôs Birth. What can I say, she is amazing person made us feel comfortable since day 1 she did not scare us which is very much needed when you are 1st time parents. Always available for any doubts and questions , she is having alots of patience and I had the smoothest C - section ever. Dr Meghana is a true magician in the OT.  She made me feel so comfortable in the OT. Thank you so much Doctor. Things would have never been so smooth without you in this situation of a pandemic . And my whole family is happy for your great support through out my journey . I and Baby both are doing great , happy and Healthy ‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visit Dr Meghana till 6th month of my pregnancy after that I had show in my home town. I usually don't write any reviews but I am so impressed with this doctor that I really felt like writing a review.

She has lots of patience and we can ask as many questions as we want. If there is any emergency she is just a message away from you. Since after 6th month I was not visiting her again ,she suggested exercise that I should do after 7th month before only.Once even at 8th month she replied for some emergency. It was really very kind of her. I would highly recommended her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I met Dr. Meghna during my pregnancy, and she whole-heartedly assisted me in the delivery of my baby. She did a fantastic job, and that is how I gained trust in her. 
I appreciate the fact that she listens to the concerns of a patient and performs the diagnosis accordingly. She gives ample time to every patient to discuss their concerns, and I am very comfortable with her.

My recent experience with her was nice as well. Based on my preferences, she suggested me the treatment, and I was absolutely satisfied with it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Consulted Meghana for normal delivery and as expected she supported me in all the phases of pregnancy until delivery.I admitted on Sunday night ,she attended and to my surprise she stayed entire night which boost my confidence .My second birth was completely different. I found a lot of support for laboring naturally ,delivered baby boy vaginally after very few pushes the next day morning hours.Meghana was down to earth in treating patients, she is one of the best doctors I ever came across who supported me in delivering healthy baby, it's just a brief and joyful relationship to forget all the pain that was gone in labour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had the most incredible experience with Dr. Meghana. Straight from Day 1 of my pregnancy she took me under her wings. Since this was my first pregnancy I was worried and had a lot of questions mingled with fear. She always answered all of my questions and explained everything properly. We welcomed our little bundle of joy yesterday and all thanks to Dr. Meghana's advice and her support, it was a normal delivery. I would highly recommend her to all pregnant women who is looking for a brilliant gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am not someone who reviews much, although in this case, I‚Äôd like to take this opportunity to share my experience with Dr. Meghana to aware all the new parents out there looking for valuable consultation. This is our first child and I am really happy that I chose Dr. Meghana as my wife‚Äôs gynaecologist consultant. All do's n don't's .diet n minimal exercises etc. She is very helpful and makes one feel very approachable.

Since the very first day, she guided us in a very friendly manner regarding everything and my wife just became fan of her. She was very comfortable with doctor. She gave us confidence to go forward with a normal delivery, just close your eyes and let her decide what is right for the baby and the mother. Her knowledge about the patient's needs are unmatched. Thank You

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Delivery,
review:
I visited Dr Meghana at the start of my pregnancy ,based on a recommendation. I felt very comfortable and confident with her right from the very first visit . *** ** **** ************* *** a thorough  professional . She was always on time for the consultations. I never felt rushed or hurried during any of my many visits. She created a very friendly environment, where approaching her was so easy and everything was explained in detail.

My labour and delivery wasn‚Äôt an easy one .My delivery happened as a normal one due to the sheer hard work and dedication of Dr Meghana and a very able team at the labour room . I have already recommended her to a few of my friends .

I want to sincerely thank her and her entire team. I wish her all the very best for her professional journey.

Consulted for my wife's pregnancy and then delivery. Excellent doctor, had the best experience throughout the 9 months duration. She guides very well for normal delivery and does remembers complete case history. During delivery she was very good, monitored every movement of my wife's labor. Also, explains every situation. Final C-section was also performed by her due to certain complexities and was very safely performed.
Totally recommended doctor and also treatment in Columbia Asia Hospital for deliveries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Meghna has been a blessing for us. It was in Sep 2020 when we first visited Dr. Meghna to consult for family planning after 1.5years of our wedding. She was very patient to hear out all our concerns and spent more than 30 minutes and addressed all our questions. Within 3 months‚Äô time, I was able to conceive naturally where other doctors were suggesting some surgical treatments. Throughout the pregnancy journey, Dr. Meghna has been very approachable and gave all the required information for a healthy pregnancy. She was even responsive on the personal channel for any questions I had during the journey. Even during Covid times she was able to provide online video consultation and was willing to come to her clinic if required even for 1 patient.

She had remarkable expertise in operating for C-section in Rainbow Marathahali (I opted for C-section over normal delivery) and in Sep 2021 we had our healthy 3.2Kg baby with us :)

I would highly recommend everyone to consult Dr. Meghna for any Gynac / Obstetrician need. She has great expertise in her profession, keeps her patients away from fancy pregnancy-related products available in the market, and advises them to follow as normal and healthy a routine as possible as she always says "Pregnancy is not a disease". She is never in a rush to move to other patients and charges a very nominal fee.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I (Shruthi AK) consulted the Doctor for Pregnancy checkup and Delivery , DR Meghana is the best gynaecologist, she is very patient listens to all the questions and provides good guidance.
We had planned for delivery in Marathalli because of Dr Meghana.
I had Gestational diabetes ,hyperthyroidism and Ovary Cyst inspite of all these complications , i was able to delivery healthy baby because of Dr Meghana expertise and guidance.

I strongly recommend the doctor for everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I will fall short of word to share my experience with such an amazing doctor. 

Dr. Meghna Reddy was my support system during my pregnancy. She acted as an absolute guide and she encouraged me for vaginal delivery. Whenever I use to visit her for checkups she would make sure that all my doubts and questions are clarified. 

I feel lucky that my pregnancy to delivery journey was smooth because I had her guidance all along.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Meghna has been very friendly throughout  the whole pregnancy  period and was very supportive.  She always encouraged  me for normal delivery and she never forced any c section etc. She always responded to DMs promptly in case of doubts and urgency. I would highly  recommend Dr. Meghna.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ****** *** **** **** ****** ********** ** ********** She used to explain every aspect very well. She is very practical and my pregnancy period was very calming and beautiful because of her guidance. I highly recommend her to all expectant mothers. I am very thankful to God she delivered my baby boy üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia),Prenatal Checkup,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
Dr meghana is a very friendly doctor. She made us feel very comfortable from the beginning of our pregnancy journey. She is pretty approachable and helps us understand things very clearly with alot of patience. I had developed preeclampsia and cholestasis towards the end of pregnancy, Dr meghana was pretty prompt and took the appropriate action at the right time and we had our baby delivered smoothly. 
We  are grateful to her and highly recommend her!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: An excellent doctor who instils confidence in her patients.  She ensures that she talks you to every step that she takes and has the patience to answer all questions - big or small. I will wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone who is looking for a straight shooting practitioner. Thanks to her I had a happy, healthy, full term child despite a complicated pregnancy!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
After two miscarriages I was worried about my pregnancy.. Meghana mam hand holder  me through out my pregnancy. 
Best points
1. She doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines or tests. 
2. She doesn't charge people with unnecessary consultation.. 
3. Always available to reach out. 
4. Prompt response to even whatsapp messages
5. Straight and simple explanations, friendliness, honesty

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our experience with Dr Meghana has been nothing short of fantastic. She makes sure to provide all the necessary comfort to her patients. She addresses all the concerns one might have. She is a world-class doctor and her good nature tops it all. She provided all the right information so that we can have normal delivery. We would recommend Dr Meghana to anyone looking for a gynaec.

review: Our experience with Dr. Meghana has been the most delightful one. She listens patiently to all queries and is very balanced in her approach. She guided us with a lot of care during my miscarriage and during my subsequent pregnancy. She gave us confidence to go forward with a normal delivery. She treats each and every patient with care and invests time & effort, which should be appreciated given today's times. Our best wishes to her.

I visited the doctor to treat breast lump. She is very friendly and treated very well. As soon as she found it is infection, immediately she drained the pus and suggested antibiotics. Thankful to the doctor for the best treatment. Iam very happy that I visited Dr Meghana for the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** ****** ** ** ********* ******** ******* ** ********** ******* *********** We have been consulting the doctor from last 18months or so for my pregnancy related advices and for my mother's hystecomy surgery and she has treated us with utmost care and expertise.

Never I have felt that I was meeting a doctor and during my pregnancy she took care of me till the delivery as a family member and she was always available irrespective of the timing like in the midnight too she used to respond over emails or whatsapp messages on guide me on my complications and queries and I have delivered a healthy baby on 19th of this month.

Though she works for a corporate hospital you ll always feel like you are under treatment of your own family member and for sure she will give *** **** ********* **** utmost personal care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: During my wife's first pregnancy we had baby with still birth because of which we were very much concerned about planning for second pregnancy. We wanted to consult a doctor who can provide us that extra attention and concern and then we were referred by my brother to visit Dr. Meghana. And I have made the right call by consulting her. My wife is blessed with a baby girl recently. Dr. Meghana has always guided and provided us with detailed explanation and way forward. There were few complications in the first and last trimester and Dr. was very helpful in explaining the issue and providing the solution. She has been extra cautious and caring through out our pregnancy which we very much aspired and needed.we are very much thankful for the care and attention provided to us by Dr. Meghana. I would seriously recommend consulting Dr. Meghana as she can provide the right treatment with an extra care and attention which is highly required during pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me and my wife have visited doctor Meghna Reddy two times for pregnancy check up. Both the times she was very friendly and polite. She is the best doctor I have ever met in my life. My wife Aiswarya feels very happy and relaxed after meeting her. She gave proper guidance and explained the process clearly. She is not after money like other doctors. For the 2nd visit she didn't charge us as it was follow up. *** ** ****** *** ***** I will recommend all pregnant women to consult with doctor Meghna Reddy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr Meghna from second trimester and I would Strongly recommend her to anyone. She had been our doctor and guide throughout my pregnancy period. She was always available on whatsapp for any query . She paid utmost care in everything and boosted my morale everytime she came for checkup in hospital room after surgery and was extremely vigilant in telling me solutions to all uneasiness I was facing. It was just coz of her motivation , kind words and expertise in treatment that I was able to cope up with surgery and was even able to walk day 2 onwards. I am really thankful to her.

The doctor is very caring and she always gives priority to her patients. I got to know about Dr Meghana Reddy through my cousin. When I went to  visit her I was in the 5th month of my pregnancy and after looking into all my reports she told that yours will be going to be a normal delivery. And ultimately it was a normal delivery for me and all my family members were happy. She never encourage c section untill and unless it is necessary. She do respect other feelings and she talk so politely with her patients. Thank you so much Dr Meghana Reddy.
